name: Megalophobia
description:
You’re a part of a rescue team who explores an unknown part of the ocean. Your mission is to find a submarine which went missing in a deep trench during their scientific exploration.
Your team consists of a pilot, Capitain Rodriguez, and a marine Biologist, Dr Johnson. The team will have to discover the horrors of the ocean depths and secrets about themselves. 

We're a student team of game developers and Megalophobia is our 3D exploration game, which is part of our semester project! Hope you like it.
